name: PT100
description: Platinum resistance temperature sensor built into steel tube V4A, 1/2 inch, suitable for installation in pipes. Thermal response time T0,9 in the air 255 s, in water  45 s. Suitable for transmission in 2- or 3-wire technique. Weight 120 g Dimensions: 110 mm insertion depth

name: Insertion Style Flow Sensors - 220 Series
description: 220 Series sensors are specifically designed for installation in underground vaults that might be subjected to flooding. As the liquid flow turns the impeller, a low impedance 8V DC square wave signal is transmitted with a frequency proportional to the flow rate. This signal can travel up to 2,000 feet between the sensor and the display unit without the need for amplification.

name: Dräger Sensor® XS (HF/HCI, H2O2, N2H4)
description: Electrochemical sensor - Monitoring of toxic gases - Compatible with Dräger X-am 5100 - Measuring range: in ppm

name: Model 15T/H
description: High-performance, economical encoder - Low profile - 25.4 mm height and 38 mm diameter - Thru-bore or blind hollow bore with bores up to 10 mm - Simple, innovative flex mounting system (Global Mounting Standards) Up to 12-pole commutation optional for brushless motor control
